metadata.Description: The Water-Energy Nexus Policy addresses the interdependencies between water and energy systems to optimize the use of resources and promote sustainability in both sectors.

Water-Energy Nexus Policy.Description: The policy promotes water conservation by optimizing energy use in water treatment and distribution systems.
It enhances energy efficiency in water-intensive industries and encourages the use of renewable energy in water management.
The policy implements integrated resource management practices to ensure sustainable use of water and energy resources.
It involves extensive stakeholder collaboration to align the objectives and strategies of both the water and energy sectors.
This policy is a key initiative of SEH, reflecting its holistic approach to resource management and sustainability.
